prompts: Create a green Pokemon with a plump body and a playful expression.
Imagine a cute, round creature that can slide around effortlessly.
Give me a small, jelly-like Pokemon that has a yellow antenna on its head.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a swamp with a soft green color.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it just ate a big meal and is ready for a nap.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has a gooey appearance.
Make a simple yet charming creature that can blend into grassy environments.
